title: Your Stay-Healthy Toolkit
author: Marygrace Taylor Expert Reviewed
description: Stay healthy and safe during the novel coronavirus pandemic with useful info, including foods to help the immune system, workouts to do at home and other health tips.
cleaned_text: Your Stay-Healthy Toolkit As the novel coronavirus continues to spread, there are still a lot of unknowns. The best thing to do for your health and safety is to stay calm and stay informed. We recommend the following credible resources for breaking news and important updates on the pandemic: [Centers for Disease Control and you think you may need medical attention for COVID-19 symptoms, consider using the CDC's [Coronavirus Self-Checker](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/symptoms-testing/symptoms.html) before calling your doctor or local hospital. Here at LIVESTRONG.com, our mission is to be your reliable resource for living well and staying active during this stressful time. Read on for tips and guidance on how to stay healthy, safe and sane as we navigate this pandemic together. [Most Americans Should Get the New COVID-19 Booster Shot to Be Fully Vaccinated.
